Bullet train or Better trains - What does India need?
Travelling plays a major role in our day to day life, it is very important that the mode of travelling should be very convenient and fast. As most of the people opt for convenint and smooth way of travelling and they want to enjoy it without any disturbances.In India most of the people look for safety and they opt to go by Railways. Bullet trains are very convenient and better option for the people in this present scenario compared to others .In the present changing era people are very busy and always wants to cope with the change.By travelling in the bullet trains they can save time and can utlize that time in other things.Now a days people are not bothered about money etc ,they are bothered about time . Bullet trains is one of the best mode of travelling where we can reach our destination on time and also are affordable and is also safe.

From ages most of the people prefer trains compared to other mode of transport.Earlier most of the people use to travel in normal trains as the standard of living was very low and all the people were not in a position to afford them.And travelling by trains was very boring and use to take lot of time.  As with the changing situations the standard of living of people is improving and also the technology is updraded and  now majority of the people are interested in bullet trains. Now people became time centric and want to save time.As we can traffic jams and other problems due to other mode of transport where they waste lot of time. we can overcome all these problems by travelling in bullet trains In the present scenario there are lot of upgradations in the technology and all the developed countries are using different technologies to make the mode of travel easy and safe. Safety is very important most of the people look for it bullet trains and are one of the best option they have. 

The facilities provided by bullet trains are also very good when compared to other other trains  .We can easily book our tickets and also they are affordable to all the people. Now a days everything is online so we can easily book tickets and save time and people are also not resisting much to change as they were in the earlier and all are showing lot of interest to learn new things and update themselves.The mindsets of the people are also changing and tryiny to explore new things and learn different things and want the best thing out of the alternative they have.  

Looking at the world there are many changes and updations in technologies and india is a developing country it should also progress and cope with changes in the world. Government should encourage and motivate people to update themselves so that they can enjoy more benefits in travelling.Government should create such interest in the people so that they can easily adapt the changes.If they can create such interest in people it would really benefit the people and also inturn help in the growth of the economy so that  we can see India as developed country in future.
